languages.text: "Вашу неспособность самостоятельно одолеть врага списываю на недостаток рвения. Всем выжившим — дисциплинарное взыскание".
"I attribute your inability to defeat the enemy on your own to a lack of commitment. All survivors are subject to disciplinary action."
languages.original_text: "Вашу неспособность самостоятельно одолеть врага списываю на недостаток рвения. Всем выжившим — дисциплинарное взыскание".

traits.locale_text: "I attribute your inability to defeat the enemy on your own to a lack of commitment. All survivors are subject to disciplinary action."
"I attribute your inability to defeat the enemy on your own to a lack of commitment. All survivors are subject to disciplinary action."
"I attribute your inability to defeat the enemy on your own to a lack of commitment. All survivors are subject to disciplinary action."
"I attribute your inability to defeat the enemy on your own to a lack of commitment. All survivors are subject to disciplinary action."
"I attribute your inability to defeat the enemy on your own to a lack of commitment. All survivors are subject to disciplinary action."
"I attribute your inability to defeat the enemy on your own to a lack of commitment. All survivors are subject to disciplinary action."

languages.text: «Considero su incapacidad de derrotar al enemigo sin ayuda una falta de dedicación. Todos los supervivientes recibirán acción disciplinaria».
languages.original_text: "I attribute your inability to defeat the enemy on your own to a lack of commitment. All survivors are subject to disciplinary action."

traits.locale_text: «Considero su incapacidad de derrotar al enemigo sin ayuda una falta de dedicación. Todos los supervivientes recibirán acción disciplinaria».

languages.text: 「自力で敵を倒せなかったのは、努力不足だ。生存者全員を懲戒処分の対象とする」
languages.original_text: "I attribute your inability to defeat the enemy on your own to a lack of commitment. All survivors are subject to disciplinary action."

traits.locale_text: 「自力で敵を倒せなかったのは、努力不足だ。生存者全員を懲戒処分の対象とする」

languages.text: “你们没能顺利击败来袭的敌人，这都是因为你们缺乏纪律。所有活下来的人都要接受纪律处分。”
languages.original_text: "I attribute your inability to defeat the enemy on your own to a lack of commitment. All survivors are subject to disciplinary action."

traits.locale_text: “你们没能顺利击败来袭的敌人，这都是因为你们缺乏纪律。所有活下来的人都要接受纪律处分。”

languages.text: "Ich schreibe Eure Unfähigkeit, den Feind allein zu besiegen, einem Mangel an Einsatzbereitschaft zu. Alle Überlebenden werden mit disziplinarischen Strafen belegt."
languages.original_text: "I attribute your inability to defeat the enemy on your own to a lack of commitment. All survivors are subject to disciplinary action."

traits.locale_text: "Ich schreibe Eure Unfähigkeit, den Feind allein zu besiegen, einem Mangel an Einsatzbereitschaft zu. Alle Überlebenden werden mit disziplinarischen Strafen belegt."

languages.text: « J'attribue votre incapacité à vaincre l'ennemi seul à un manque de dévouement. Tous les survivants seront soumis à des mesures disciplinaires. »
languages.original_text: "I attribute your inability to defeat the enemy on your own to a lack of commitment. All survivors are subject to disciplinary action."

traits.locale_text: « J'attribue votre incapacité à vaincre l'ennemi seul à un manque de dévouement. Tous les survivants seront soumis à des mesures disciplinaires. »

languages.text: "Düşmanı yenme konusundaki başarısızlığınızı isteksizliğinize veriyorum. Hayatta kalanlar hakkında disiplin işlemi yapılacak."
languages.original_text: "I attribute your inability to defeat the enemy on your own to a lack of commitment. All survivors are subject to disciplinary action."
